relatedanime.anime: Monster Strike Anime: Kieyuku Uchuu Hen
Monster Sonic! D`Artagnan no Idol Sengen

anime.description: The protagonist, Ren Homura, returns to the town of Kaminohara, where he once lived. But did he really live in this place before? A nagging feeling tugs at his memories. Meanwhile, a strange game is forcefully installed onto his smartphone - a game called Monster Strike. A gauntlet of battles await him. Through the fierce fighting, he pieces together his scattered memories while uncovering the truth of the game. He`s supported by his companions: Aoi Mizusawa, Akira Kagetsuki, and Minami Wakaba. Together they take a step into the unknown, unsuspecting of the secrets hidden below the surface... Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: 続・最終話「パンドラの箱」
An Encore and Continuance: Pandora`s Box
Zoku Saishuu Wa "Pandora no Hako"
episode.summary: - A strange phenomenon is overtaking the world?! - After defeating the War Gods, Ren and his friends are living the dream. It seems like they`ve finally managed to regain their normal lives. However, a mysterious girl by the name of Pandora appears, bringing with her a box that must never be opened. An unfortunate incident results in the box opening (of course), setting the world up for some big changes...

episode.title: 前夜祭スペシャル: 渇望の果ての理想郷
The Night Before Special: The Long-Awaited Utopia
Zen`yasai Special: Katsubou no Hate no Risoukyou
episode.summary: - Avalon System...activated... - The opening of Pandora`s Box has given everyday life a monsterific spin. One day, Genma notifies Ren of a response from an "Oragon-like monster". Ren and the gang make their way to the location, only to be surprised by a gigantic floating object—Avalon.

episode.title: 転校生は超絶級?
The Transfer Student Is Impossible-Level?
Tenkousei wa Chouzetsukyuu?
episode.summary: - Ren, nice to meet you! - Per Genma`s request, Ren and friends spend their days protecting the town from feral monsters. The day after defeating Basilisk with contributions from Gabby and Avalon, a transfer student named Mana appears in their class. And she`s from America?!

episode.title: 焼き鳥・男気・冒険王
Chicken Skewers, Manliness, and the Voyager
Yakitori, Otokoge, Bouken Ou
episode.summary: If anything ever happens, I`ll be there to protect you. That`s what it means to be a man! Ren and the crew go around town battling several roaming monsters, including Fellmane and Surtr. But their search for strays takes them to a rather unexpected place: a yakitori restaurant. There, they find Sinbad among the crowd, with Azazel not far behind. And it doesn`t take long before a fight breaks out!

episode.title: ワルプルギスの夜
Walpurgis Night
Walpurgis no Yoru
episode.summary: - You`re not going anywhere... - Mana teams up with Walpurgis to save Ren from Acala`s assault. While providing backup for Mana, Ren battles the healing and multiplying Acala alongside her. But as their battle rages on, two nefarious men watch from the shadows. What could they be planning?

episode.title: 穢土に轟く忿怒の業拳
The Karmic Fist of Wrath
Edo ni Todoroku Funnu no Gouken
episode.summary: - I will obliterate all this filth and sin! - Ren gives Mana a Strike Ring and inadvertently brings her closer to him. Later that day, Genma detects a new monster at a nearby government building, and it`s the guardian Acala! Just as Ren takes on the multiplying Acala, Mana appears on the scene and brings a monster they`ve never seen before!

episode.title: 斑目CEO
CEO Madarame
Madarame CEO
episode.summary: Are you kids… all right? Ren and the gang have brought Mana to Odaiba. They expected a fun day of sightseeing, but suddenly face trouble when Kraken appears! Then President Madarame, an MS player who runs a huge company, and his monster, Miroku, make a grand appearance…

episode.title: 美人天使の湯けむり事件簿
The Beautiful Angel`s Steamy Case File
Bijin Tenshi no Yukemuri no Jikenbo
episode.summary: - I can sense it… The surge of these holy healing waters… - In the hot-spring town, Akira and Genma encounter Raphael, who has come in search of healing waters. They join Ren and the gang, but just as they decide to enjoy the hot springs, they pick up a monster signal from the women`s bath! Gabriel, Lucifer, and the rest engage in battle against the ruffians trying to disturb their bath time!

episode.title: 温泉, それは聖なる癒し
Holy Healing Hot Springs
Onsen, Sore wa Seinaru Iyashi
episode.summary: Ren and the gang visit a hot-spring resort after being invited by Mana. Just when they all think they can relax, something causes the hot water in the springs to boil. And then, Lucifer and Raphael appear… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炸裂! セブンス・ギャラクシー
Seventh Galaxy Explosion!
Sakuretsu! Seventh Galaxy
episode.summary: - Let`s join forces, Sinbad! - Sinbad has brought his battleship to the surface to protect the shop from Azazel`s attack. He attempts to turn the tables by firing a bombardment, but the output is too low! It seems he needs to gather up and display the power of manliness for the bombardment to work. Can Ren`s own spirit of manliness shine in to help Sinbad?!

episode.title: 恐怖の大王
The King of Terror
Kyoufu no Daiou
episode.summary: Would you help me search for Nostradamus? Ren is searching for Nostradamus, the great seer of the monster world. He follows a monster signal to find Angolmois, a monster that serves Nostradamus. Having gained the cooperation of Angolmois, Ren and his friends race around Tokyo in search of Nostradamus!

episode.title: 占い師も困惑! エナジーポイントは何処に?
Even the Fortune Teller Is Baffled! Where`s the Energy Point?
Uranaishi mo Konwaku! Energy Point wa Doko ni?
episode.summary: - I can see all things that happen in this world. - To help President Madarame, Ren and his friends decide to search for the energy points hidden in various locations. During a visit to Harajuku in search of clues, they meet a fortune teller. But the fortunes they hear start to diverge in an unexpected direction, revealing the pasts of Walpurgis, Napoleon, and Ryoma...

episode.title: 森羅万象の特異点
The Singularity of All Creation
Shinrabanshou no Tokuiten
episode.summary: - With my bow, as the haze of summer`s heat, I shall destroy! - After picking up a Monster Signal from the Rainbow Bridge, Ren and his friends rush there with President Madarame. When they arrive, they see the bridge enveloped in a flickering heat haze. In the midst of it, the guardian of the new energy point, Marici, appears.

episode.title: 争いの無い世界
A World with No Fighting
Arasoi no Nai Sekai
episode.summary: - I have but one goal: to create a peaceful world with no fighting. - Ren and the gang are invited to visit President Madarame`s penthouse in Odaiba. While they`re all stunned by his luxurious lifestyle, President Madarame tells them about his dream. Touched by his sincerity, Ren agrees to help him, but then a monster shows up on the Rainbow Bridge...

episode.title: 森の英雄ロビン・フッド
Robin Hood (Evolution)
Mori no Eiyuu Robin Hood
episode.summary: - What follows is a battlefield where we walk side by side with death. - Ren and the gang follow a Monster Signal into the mountains, where they encounter a man who calls himself Robin Hood. He tells them that he came to this world in pursuit of some vicious monsters. Then the monsters he`s been chasing, Gordi and Bardi, suddenly appear. All at once, the forest has become a battlefield!

episode.title: それぞれの想い
Each of Their Feelings
Sorezore no Omoi
episode.summary: - "Why not try being honest with your own feelings, Aoi?" "My own feelings…" - During a brief break, Ren and his friends decide to see a fireworks show. Aoi is overcome by a feeling she can`t put into words when she sees the mood being set between Ren and Mana, but Napoleon and Nostradamus give her a push to be more honest with her own feelings...

episode.title: 輪廻へ導く菩提樹の仙峡
The Eternal Endless Cycle
Rinne e Michibiku Bodaiju no Senkyou
episode.summary: - I will change the future! - Ren and the others struggle to deal with Hraesvelgr`s assault as well as the attacks from Shambhala`s right and left hands. Aoi and Nostradamus attempt to make contact with the young girl controlling Shambhalla, but she refuses to listen. So Nostradamus, vowing to change the future, launches a counterattack along with Aoi!

episode.title: 大預言者ノストラダムス
The Great Seer Nostradamus
Dai Yogensha Nostradamus
episode.summary: - I have seen your future… - After a massive search, Ren and the gang finally find Nostradamus. They waste no time asking for a prediction, but Nostradamus refuses due to trauma in her past. Aoi sees a bit of herself in that answer. Then a new enemy, Shambhala, suddenly appears!

episode.title: 神殺しの提督ネイヴィス
Admiral Navis the God Killer
Kamigoroshi no Teitoku Navis
episode.summary: Go ahead, try and take on the pride of our navy! The goddess of the sea, Maso, has disappeared. Edward Teach and San Kamomeino find a broken watch that confirms Admiral Nevis is behind it all. In order to unleash the true power of Divinity on Maso`s right arm, Ren and company head to Jiufen to find its matching pair, Clairaudience. But then, Nevis`s ship appears...

episode.title: 女海賊アルビダの奮闘
The Lady Pirate Alwida`s Arduous Battle
Onna Kaizoku Alwida no Funtou
episode.summary: - I am Awilda, a pirate of the great seas! After analyzing Nostradamus`s predictions, Ren and the gang head to Taiwan with Madarame CEO. As they`re enjoying the night market, a flying battleship appears in the sky. The ship`s captain, Karen Nevis chases the pirate, Awilda, in an airborne skirmish. Ren decides to help Awilda and the mysterious girl she`s protecting!

episode.title: ツクヨミVSツクヨミ零
Tsukuyomi vs Tsukuyomi: Zero
Tsukuyomi vs Tsukuyomi Rei
episode.summary: - A light within darkness... - To return the town to normal, Ren and friends battle against Tsukuyomi: Zero, a fragment of the original. Will they be able to defeat the self-resurrecting flying monsters summoned by Tsukuyomi: Zero? And Tsukuyomi begins to move as well...

episode.title: 永久を夢む女神
The Moon`s Eternal Dreamer
Eikyuu o Yumemu Megami
episode.summary: - Something has definitely happened… to the moon goddess Tsukuyomi! - A strange phenomenon has been occurring recently in which the moon is full every single night. Ren and the others encounter the monster Suihanjar, who`s on patrol to protect all the town`s dinner tables, and learn that the moon goddess Tsukuyomi is probably behind the moon incident. What has happened to Tsukuyomi?

episode.title: 最後の番人
The Last Guardian
Saigo no Bannin
episode.summary: - When the crimson moon falls, the world nears its end. - Ren and company return from Taiwan to find the Energy Points in Japan causing a ruckus. Following Genma`s instructions, they split into two groups to cover their targets. But right as they leave, they run into Haruma and Taiyo! With powerful allies by their sides, Ren and company arrive at the Energy Points, where Bishamonten and Daikoku appear before them as the guardians. Haruma brings out his new partner Genghis Khan, and an unlikely Robin Hood makes an appearance for the battle of a lifetime!

episode.title: 媽祖の真実
The Truth of Mazu
Mazu no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: - I will avenge Maso! - Walpurgis finds herself trapped by Blackbeard in a moment of weakness. But then, out of the sky, Nevis flies in to save her! While Nevis and Blackbeard go head to head on the deck, Mana searches inside the ship. There, she finds Meimei tied to the mast...

episode.title: 黒髭ティーチの企み
The Scheming of Blackbeard Teach
Kurohige Teach no Takurami
episode.summary: - Alright, you rapscallions! We`re here for your treasure! - In Jiufen, sparks fly between Awilda and Nevis, but when it`s revealed that Nevis`s watch was found where Maso disappeared, they realize it`s all over. Nevis begins the attack on Blackbeard`s ship, but then Meimei does the unthinkable. Knowing what`s in store, Mana heads to Blackbeard`s ship!
